About Me

Hi! I'm Aron, a second-year student at UCLA studying computational math.

My interests include 3D graphics, game design, as well as AI, specifically language models and image generation and recognition. I have experience in C++ and am currently trying to learn more about AI, video game development, and where the crossover between these two fields might be. I have also been working with Javascript, specifically Three.js to make 3D web graphics.

Outside of programming, I enjoy rock climbing and playing the ukulele.
